key.name: homepage
key.description: URI of the gemini document used as a homepage

key.name: max-history
key.description: Maximum number of URIs that will be remembered per session (i.e. window or a tab).

key.name: sessions
key.description: Each browsing session is identified by a unique string key and comprised of a history of visited URIs and an index of current URI from the history.

key.name: tabs
key.description: Each element of tabs list is an id matching a single session

key.name: window-maximized
key.summary: Whether the window was maximized on last run
key.description: Whether the window was maximized on last run

key.name: font-size
key.summary: Base gemtext font size in em
key.description: Base size of text in TextView used to render gemtext. Headdings, monospace, etc may use relativelly larger or smaller size. Value expressed in em.
